root.name: screenX()
root.description: Takes a three-dimensional X, Y, Z position and returns the X value for where it will appear on a (two-dimensional) screen.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: 3D x coordinate to be mapped

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: 3D y coordinate to be mapped

parameter.label: z
parameter.description: int or float: 3D z coordinate to be mapped
